name: Terrors Of The Flesh
description:
You are the only survivor in West De Ville Floodplains, having to navigate the post-apocalyptic world. The Terrors are after you. You only have one job and that is to get out of there alive.

Other survivors out there, beyond the bridge, it's up to you to save civilisation, or what is left of it. Complete the tasks to get the hell out of there.

CONTROLS:

W key/ Up arrow - move forwards

S key/Down arrow - move backwards

A key/Left arrow - move left

D key/Right arrow - move right

E key - enter truck/exit truck

Use mouse/touchpad to look around and point gun

Left mouse click/Left click on the touchpad - fire the gun

Hold down the shift key to run
